DESCRIPTION: Hornets are 1-cost attacks that deal 11 damage.
Bumblebees are 1-cost skills that gain 10 block.
Worker Bees are 0-cost skills that gain 5 Nectar. At the start of your turn, gain [E] for every 10 Nectar.
Drones are 0-cost skills that draw 2 cards and exhaust.
For every 10 Nectar, you gain 1 [E] at the start of your turn, also activate Honey-boost effects on cards once each for every 10 Nectar when played.
Swarm grants you block and damages enemies. It attacks enemies you target, and returns to you when you block.
Hive cards are Hornets, Bumblebees, Workerbees and Drones.
When a Pollinated enemy is attacked, gain 1 Nectar. Gain 1 [E] for every 10 Nectar at the start of your turn.
Transform a Drone in your hand or draw pile into the chosen hive card. Hand is checked before draw pile.
While this is in your hand, it will list a series of card types. Play them in sequence to reap the rewards!
Take 50% less damage. On receiving attack damage, lose 1 Flight.
A Riposte is a 1-cost Attack that deals 9 damage.
A Riposte+ is a 1-cost Attack that deals 11 damage.
A commander is a Hive card that upgrades all Hive cards of the same type in your draw pile.
Playing a finisher ends your turn immediately.
A Drone+ is a 0-cost skill that draw 2 cards and Exhausts.
At the start of your turn, gain 1 Nectar for each Production.
Activated if your current deck contains more Attacks than Skills.
Your swarm will not move from the target during this turn.
Activates once for every 10 Nectar you have.
